title: College of Arts and Sciences' Big Ideas Fund
description: To support awards for faculty, staff and students in the College of Arts and Sciences at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: With nurturing, novel ideas can mature into transformational solutions. As the foundation for our university’s bold, innovative community of scholars and learners, the College of Arts and Sciences cultivates critical, creative, and compassionate thinkers who solve the humanitarian, social, and technological challenges of our time. Toward this end, the College for Arts and Sciences’ Fund for Big Ideas will provide support to seed and pilot some original concepts from the College’s best thinkers.
